          Video resources
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Videos optimized for Twitter drive an increase of 33% in emotional engagement*.Â Make your message more memorable by adding video to your Twitter strategy. 
 * Increase in 33% is versus non-optimized TVCs. Source: GroupM + Twitter, EyeSee, TVCs vs Optimized Ads on Twitter, December 2018.Â  
 
 
 
 
 
 
    Learn more

    
    

    
    
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
          Crisis communication for brands
         
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Twitter is a platform that plays a significant role in crisis communications, and can be a powerful tool for you to communicate with your customers, employees, and the broader ecosystem. As you do so, we hope this advice will help.
